sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Verizon Communications ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Verizon Communications has lost about 0.5% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Intel ( INTC ), trading down 0.8%.
Intel is lower by about 0.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading down 0.6%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
